sub-events.comment: Lerp Movement vectors to the new ones Make controls behave normally

action.name: Set vector X
action.param: Self.Platform.VectorX * cos(-anglediff(startAngle, Self.Platform.GravityAngle)) - Self.Platform.VectorY * sin(-anglediff(startAngle, Self.Platform.GravityAngle))

action.name: Set vector Y
action.param: Self.Platform.VectorY * cos(-anglediff(startAngle, Self.Platform.GravityAngle)) + Self.Platform.VectorX * sin(-anglediff(startAngle, Self.Platform.GravityAngle))

action.name: Set vector X
action.param: Self.Platform.VectorX * cos(-anglediff(startAngle, Self.Platform.GravityAngle)) - Self.Platform.VectorY * sin(-anglediff(startAngle, Self.Platform.GravityAngle))

action.name: Set vector Y
action.param: Self.Platform.VectorY * cos(-anglediff(startAngle, Self.Platform.GravityAngle)) + Self.Platform.VectorX * sin(-anglediff(startAngle, Self.Platform.GravityAngle))

action.name: Set angle
action.param: Collider.Skin = "ada"? RightArm.Angle : RightArm.Angle - Collider.Side * 90 - 45 * cos(180 + time * 60 * 8)

action.name: Set angle
action.param: Collider.Skin = "ada"? RightArm.Angle : RightArm.Angle - Collider.Side * 90 - 45 * cos(180 + time * 60 * 10)
